Urho3D::IsFlagSet< T > Struct Template Reference

Type trait which enables Enum to be used as FlagSet template parameter. Bitwise operators (| & ^ ~) over enabled Enum will result in FlagSet<Enum>. More...

#include <Urho3D/Container/FlagSet.h>

Static Public Attributes

static constexpr bool value_ = false
 

Detailed Description

template<typename T>
struct Urho3D::IsFlagSet< T >

Type trait which enables Enum to be used as FlagSet template parameter. Bitwise operators (| & ^ ~) over enabled Enum will result in FlagSet<Enum>.

The documentation for this struct was generated from the following file:
